reviews.text: what a fantastic holiday, i stayed here with my 3 boys age 18, 14, and 9 in the last week in october. the hotel caters for all ages with plenty of activities for all to enjoy, there was plenty of variety in food, even the fussy eaters could enjoy chips for breakfast if they wanted to. the animation team worked very hard, to ensure our stay was enjoyable, the boys enjoyed winning on the games to recieve certificates and to stand on the podeum. David went out of his way to make everyone feel happy to join him in the actvites. Elvis & Beatles tributes and the magician certainly kept us entertained in the evening. our rooms were cleaned everyday with fresh towels. all the staff were very friendly, whether we was at the bar, in the resturant or the reception. i would like to say a big thankyou to Rafael from reception who made our stay most enjoyable, with his warm welcome smile we found him to be kind caring friendly and approachable throughout our stay,
reviews.title: perfect holiday

reviews.text: you must visit siam park and loro parque they are great fun days out for all the family .
reviews.title: Great hols!
Not for us
reviews.text: i would definitely recommend this all inclusive hotel to anyone, we are most certainly booking to return in the future

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: from the Metcalfe family.
reviews.title: Fantastic Holiday

reviews.text: I was a bit dubious having read really differing views but I neednt have worried. This place offers really good value for money, when looking to book a holiday during the October half term this place was about £1000 cheaper for our family of four than other hotels. But the service etc was great. The hotel itself is really nicely laid out, our room was really spacious, yes dated and if I am honest if I sat around and started looking closely at things I could probably list a good few things that were not up to scratch but as far as I was concerned I was only sleeping and showering in there! Food was great always something to choose from. I have a very fussy 5 year old but he was no more fussy here as he is at home so he made do with bread and pasta and some chicken nuggets!
reviews.title: All Inclusive Dream Holliday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Other hald and I are just home from Villa Tagoro. What a great week - fantastic value for money, very relaxing, lovely stay.
reviews.title: Fantastic stay, great value for money

reviews.text: We booked a standard room via Travel Republic and were delighted when on arrival, we found we were allocated one of the superior apartments (number 233), which was situated on the front corner of the complex, had a sea view, two-sided balcony, sun loungers, Sky TV and a large round jacuzzi tub in the bathroom.
reviews.title: Enjoyable and cheap!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Grounds are well kept. Furniture in the room was a little tired (more 3 star than 4 star), but the beds and sofa were comfy.
reviews.title: Fabulous Priced Holiday

reviews.text: Cleaners were all friendly and every day we had a swan or love heart shape made out of the fresh towels, with flower petals on the bed too. Very sweet.
reviews.title: Fab holiday would recomend definately!!!!!!!!

reviews.text: Food was good. Plenty of choice for everyone. Fresh fish, chicken, steak, pork, paella most days. Lots of different veggies, salads, canarian potatoes, chips. Different soups at lunchtime and teatime. Plenty of desserts too. Restaurant staff all very friendly and chatty, same with the bar staff.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel, will definately return and recommend this hotel

reviews.text: This accomodation is fantastic with such a family feel to it. Nothing is too much trouble. Little extras like champagne delivered round the pool and Mojitos in Mexican day! food fantastic and fresh fish offered o. The hot plate every session... Apartments cleaned everyday and poolside is spotless. Staff are so friendly and entertainment team are fantastic, especially David and Sol.. Will defiantly return just wish the loyalty card was able to be give on return and not after 4 visits
reviews.title: Fabulous family feel to the place and nothing is too much trouble

reviews.text: This is slightly belated having stayed in September this year. I stayed here with my sister for a week and I cannot fault the service of the hotel staff, especially the resturant staff. They worked their jjolly socks off and had to put up with a lot of rude customers which , I'm shamed to admit, were british.
reviews.title: Humble Pie

reviews.text: good location, and very good food. I'm vegetarian and there was a good selection. Good winde. Can't fault the hotel. The cleaners were very good and had to fight with an influx of ants in our room but did well!! We had a lovely swan decoration out of towels which was a lovely touch.
reviews.title: loved it !!!

reviews.text: The only thing that let this hotel down was the clientelle. They were incredibly rude and ruined the atmosphere of this hotel but if you're prepared to ignore that, it's worth a visit. You could do far worse in Tenerife.
reviews.title: If you can get it cheap go

reviews.text: Hi, i went with my husband and 2 boys aged 13 & 9 , the end of Oct. We loved the hotel, very safe for children, lovely staff, good drinks, brill pool. The food was ok , never got a bad belly but sometimes it was a little cold but they will sort it out for you if you ask them. the staff will do anything that they can to make your stay a good, We met a lovely couple (mark & Sonia) and the kids had a load of friends. Very friendly place. Give it ago..... i would defo go back :)
reviews.title: clean hotel with happy staff

reviews.text: We've stayed at this hotel for two weeks with our 19 months baby.
reviews.title: Tired old rooms, excellent staff, cockroaches in the restaurant!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had an apartment composed of a medium size bathroom with a bath tub, an open space hallway/living room/kitchen and a bedroom that we entered from the living room.
reviews.title: A wonderful family hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The apartment was old furnished, the doors were squeaking and rubbing the tiled floor so opening them once the baby was asleep was a challenge.
reviews.title: Dont waste your money!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It had a very large terrace, luckily for us it was child safe, but I've seen other terraces with a very short fence that any baby could climb.
reviews.title: Amazing hotel like disneyworld! Beautiful! staff friendly, food fantastic!

reviews.text: We asked for a baby cot, but the hotel refused to confirm that we would get one, so we took our travel baby cot. It was a good thing to do since the baby cot we got from the hotel was very used and torn, but I've also seen some new ones when they were cleaning up checked out rooms.
reviews.title: Cockroaches in Microwave!!!!
